snippet.title: GLOOMHAVEN | Cinematic Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Gloomhaven 1.0 is available now on Steam and GoG for PC.
🗡️ Get it on Steam: https://bit.ly/3FEx0a7
🗡️ And GoG: https://bit.ly/3BFDjaS
We announced it. We teased it. We did it. 
Gloomhaven is finally 100% content complete and ready to be enjoyed by everyone out there.

#ReleaseTheGloom

🔥 Be sure to subscribe to this channel to stay tuned!

💀 Join the community on Discord:
https://discord.gg/gloomhaven

📢 Be the first mercenary informed on Facebook and Twitter:
https://twitter.com/GloomhavenGame
https://www.facebook.com/GloomhavenGame
https://www.facebook.com/groups/GloomhavenGame

🔗 Twin Sails social channels can be found below:
https://www.facebook.com/TwinSailsInt
https://twitter.com/TwinSailsInt
